Description: JOB PURPOSE• Overseeing and managing the fulfillment operations for Neo Egypt, by ensuring efficient processing and delivery of CASA accounts, while meeting quality and productivity targetsKEY RESULT AREAS• Fulfillment Operations Management:o Oversee the end-to-end fulfillment process, including KYC processing at partner store, document management, inventory management, picking, packing, and shipping.o Develop and implement efficient workflows and standard operating procedures (SOPs) to optimize fulfillment operations.o Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs), such as TAT, order accuracy, on-time delivery, and inventory turnover, and take corrective actions as needed.o Collaborate with other departments, such as sales, customer service, and logistics, to ensure smooth order fulfillment and resolve any issues that may arise.• Inventory Management:o Plan and forecast inventory levels based on historical data, sales forecasts, and market trends to avoid stockouts or excess inventory.o Coordinate with Card Operations to ensure timely replenishment of inventory.• Team Leadership and Development:o Supervise and train fulfillment staff (3rd party), providing guidance on processes, quality standards, and performance expectations.o Conduct performance evaluations, provide feedback, and identify opportunities for skill development or training.• Quality Control and Process Improvement:o Establish quality control measures to ensure accurate processingo Conduct regular quality checks and audits to identify areas for improvement and implement corrective actions.o Continuously evaluate and optimize fulfillment processes to increase efficiency, reduce errors, and enhance customer experience.o Stay updated with industry best practices and technological advancements related to fulfillment operations.• Data Analysis and Reporting:o Collect and analyze data related to fulfillment operations, including order volumes, productivity metrics, and customer feedback.o Prepare regular reports and dashboards to track performance, identify trends, and present insights to management.o Use data-driven insights to make informed decisions, set targets, and implement strategies for operational improvements.KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE• Bachelor's degree in business administration, supply chain management, or a related field (preferred).• Minimum experience of 5-7 years in fulfillment management or a similar role, preferably in a banking, or e-commerce or retail environment.• Strong leadership and team management skills.• Excellent organizational and problem-solving abilities.• Knowledge of fulfillment processes, including order management systems, inventory control, and warehouse operations.• Proficiency in using data analysis tools and software for reporting and decision-making.• Familiarity with quality control principles and continuous improvement methodologies.• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.• Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines.• Attention to detail and a focus on delivering high-quality results.Job Details
